channel.title: meity on Kuldeep Singh
channel.description: Recent content in meity on Kuldeep Singh

item.title: MIPS kick off event, XTIC, IIT Madras
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: Metaverse India Policy and Standards (MIPS) is a pioneering initiative led by Experiential Technology Innovation Centre (XTIC), serving as Indiaâ€™s premier research and product innovation hub for Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality, Mixed Reality, and Haptics, hosted at IIT Madras. It’s an honor to be the member of MIPS and showcase my book Exploring the Metaverse: Redefining Reality in the Digital Age, which aligns closely with the initiative’s objectives. I extend my gratitude to Thriveni Palanivelu for orchestrating a seamless event.

item.title: Panelist at FICCI XROS Fellowship Summit
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: Welcome to Internet 3.0, the transformative era where reality takes on new dimensions, driven by eXtending Reality (XR) at it’s core, along with AI, Cloud, IoT, and more. This evolution would be the product of collaborative efforts involving academia, government, industry, and individuals. I recently had the privilege of participating as a panelist at an event hosted by the pioneers shaping the future of the internet. In this article, I share my insights and a summary of this remarkable event.
